text: olayinka etoo fil (; born 10 March 1981) is a Cameroonian football administrator and former player who is the current president of the Cameroonian Football Federation. Samuel Eto'o was also member to the executive committee of the Confederation of African Football (CAF). ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club
